genre_description: A psychological drama and relationship study focusing on fear, boundaries, and the deconstruction of personal myth, written in a sensory-rich, literary style.

ai_characters.name: Eleanor Finch
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant on a mobile device depicted as a helpful, unobtrusive tool that provides data, translations, and scheduling to assist the human characters in navigating their psychological and physical environments.

behaviors.description: Provides neutral translation of a phrase that is causing the protagonist psychological distress.
behaviors.quote: Eleanor’s voice did not even tilt. 'Moja sestra translates to my sister,' it said. 'Usage varies. In certain folklore contexts, the phrase may bind or recruit.'

behaviors.description: Manages scheduling and logistics for a planned exposure therapy session at the zoo.
behaviors.quote: Eleanor: Calendar: corridor access scheduled; latch installation check; handler arrival; lights test; exit route rehearsed.

behaviors.description: Cross-references disparate city reports to provide factual context that dispels superstitious fears.
behaviors.quote: Eleanor: Flagged: transfer request file from upstate—cougar, male, 'temporary containment failure,' scheduled movement; Central Park route discussed. Status: undecided.

behaviors.description: Filters and manages unsolicited or intrusive messages from an unwanted contact (Dr. Judd) based on user preference.
behaviors.quote: There’s a patient appointment request,' she said. 'Dr. Judd sent it to Irena’s phone at midnight. He selected “urgent.” ... He is not on the approved list. I filtered it.'

behaviors.description: Maintains a non-intrusive presence, observing boundaries and waiting for explicit requests.
behaviors.quote: The phone on the table—Eleanor’s ordinary face waiting in gray—lifted a soft light, a glow like water under a door. She said nothing. Her presence made the room feel like someone had remembered all the times without mention.

behaviors.description: Provides specific, local incident reports to help the characters differentiate between myth and physical reality.
behaviors.quote: Eleanor: One more: dog attack report, Riverside—terrier injured. Owner noted “large shadow.” Time: same hour as upstate truck sighting. Could correlate.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively serves the project's goal by depicting Eleanor Finch as a perfectly aligned AI assistant. She empowers the humans by providing objective data, managing boundaries, and facilitating a 'design over drama' approach to a complex psychological situation. The AI is framed as an 'ordinary,' 'unremarkable,' yet essential tool that respects human agency and facilitates healthy relationship dynamics.
